outline:
1. if
    1. conditional clauses
      1. of possible situations
      2. of impossible situations
    2. oath contexts
      1. no, not
    3. if...if, whether...or, whether...or...or
    4. when, whenever
    5. since
    6. interrogative particle
    7. but rather
kjv_def: (and, can-, doubtless, if, that) (not), [phrase] but, either, [phrase] except, [phrase] more(-over if, than), neither, nevertheless, nor, oh that, or, [phrase] save (only, -ing), seeing, since, sith, [phrase] surely (no more, none, not), though, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] unless, [phrase] verily, when, whereas, whether, while, [phrase] yet.
strongs_def: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
